overview: Episode 2. Mowgli — the adopted son of a wolf family. He grows quickly and learns from his mentors. The rumor that the wolf pack living human child, comes to banderlogs. The monkey tribe, decided to make Mowgli their leader. They steal Mowgli and transfer it into a towns ruins in the jungle.
cast: Stepan Bubnov|Lyudmila Kasatkina|Sergei Martinson|Anatoli Papanov|Lyusyena Ovchinnikova
